title: Transdermal HRT Brewing for Beginners
description:
In this workshop we will learn how to make easy transdermal HRT (Hormone Replacement Therapy) products for trans people ourselves!

The two variants are sprays and gels, there are enough base ingredients for both.

I forgot to register this workshop earlier but you can just join us at any time at our assembly Projekt31 for a workshop.

persons.name: Lizzz (they / she)
persons.biography: Just some floating transi gurl that dreams of anarchy but doesnt believe in it so they try to make things happen on a smol scale uwu :3 If you wanna know about the HRT homebrew workshop just call my DECT or join us at our Projekt31 assembly
